page.title: 08Transport
page.content: In and around Ulcombe traffic is light and it never realy gets busy.There are few buses because there are not many people to pick up!{Traffic is slow} because there are lots of bends in the roads and people like to look at the{ {beautiful}countryside.Drivers are kind to horses and ponies,which often ride around here.Lorries often drive up and down{Ulcombe}hill,and there are a lot of tractors as well.A few{motorbikes} travel down here but not many.We have a{school bus}every Monday to take us to the swimming baths.The busiest time is about{3:30pm}when we are being picked up from school. As there is not much industry in our D block.Bus routes are scarce,only three buses stop every day.In and near Grafty Green only two run through and stop,one in the morning and one in the afternoon.
